author: unico
msg: meta tags: fortress tools don't seem to handle quotes (") very well, have to remove them in order to make it work

author: unico
msg: role management seems to be inevitable for now.
For instance, excalibur xmlutils do not have Fortress meta info yet.
Fortress' role management support uses a different role file format.

author: unico
msg: restore fortress meta instead of roles for eclipse

author: unico
msg: use <import> task instead of entities to include build files in order to be able to use xml editors again
